Package tk.artsakenos.iperunits.system.SuperEvent

Class DateConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.artsakenos.iperunits.system.SuperEvent.DateConstraint
  • public class DateConstraint
extends Object
    This class allows to define Date/Time constraints. An example: of use: 
     dc.addConstraint("START 2009-08-13 20:09:31");
 dc.addConstraint("HOUR 5");
 dc.addConstraint("HOUR 8");
 dc.addConstraint("HOUR 11");
 dc.addConstraint("YEAR 2010");
 dc.addConstraint("YEAR 2009");
 System.out.println(dc.isAccepted());
 System.out.println(dc);
 System.out.println(getNowConstraints());
 System.out.println("-------------------------------------------------");
 dc.setConstraints(" HOUR     5,HOUR 11 ,YEAR  2010,  START 2009-08-13 00:00:00");
 System.out.println(dc);
    Author:
    Andrea

      • addConstraint

        public void addConstraint​(int constraintType,
                          int constraint)
        Aggiunge un time constraint.
        Parameters:
        constraintType - Il tipo del constraint preso da DC_
        constraint - Il valore del costraint (in ore, minuti, etc...)

      • addConstraint

        public void addConstraint​(String constraint)
        Consente di inserire un constraint in formato stringa. La stringa deve essere del tipo: [{constraintType} constraintNumber] dove
        {constraintType} == MINUTE, HOUR, HOUR_OF_DAY, DAY_OF_WEEK, DAY_OF_MONTH, DAY_OF_YEAR, MONTH, YEAR.
        anche [START|END] yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss 
         Esempio: addConstraint("HOUR_OF_DAY 22");
          addConstraint("START 1980-12-30 22:12:00");
        Parameters:
        constraint - Il constraint espresso come sopra

      • setConstraints

        public final void setConstraints​(String constraints)
        Consente di impostare i constraint da una stringa che contiene i constraint in formato stringa separati da una ",".
        Parameters:
        constraints - I constraint in formato stringa separati da una ",".
